text: My best friend pushed me into the lake. This happened during our annual summer camping trip and we were enjoying a peaceful afternoon. The reason it all began, she spotted a frog near the water's edge or - this was at our favorite spot in the woods - and she dared me to catch it.
keypoint: A tranquil camping afternoon ends with my friend daring me over a frog and shoving me into the lake

text: I had just sat down to eat my sandwich and I told her I wasn't interested. 'Course friends, y'know, they don't always take no for an answer. So that's when she snuck up behind me and gave me a little nudge.
keypoint: I decline the dare while eating, but she ignores me and secretly nudges me into the water

text: When I emerged from the water, there was a frog on the shore, she just scooped it up and handed it to me. And . . .; I couldn't help but laugh â€“ uncontrollably. And naturally, the first thing to do was to get revenge, and I said, "Just you wait," I said, "you'll get yours soon enough."
keypoint: Soaked but amused, I receive the captured frog, burst into laughter, and vow playful revenge
